title: Department Top 3 Salaries
markdown:
# **Department Top 3 Salaries**

## Implement the 'Department Top 3 Salaries' query using WINDOW, DENSE_RANK.

### Table Schema
| Column | Type |
|--------|------|
| id | INT |
| val | INT |

### Example

**Input:**
```
**t1**
+----+-----+
| id | val |
+----+-----+
| 1  | 10  |
| 2  | 20  |
| 3  | 30  |
+----+-----+
```

**Expected Output:**
```
+----+-----+
| id | val |
+----+-----+
| 1  | 10  |
| 2  | 20  |
| 3  | 30  |
+----+-----+
```

testCases.setupSql: CREATE TABLE t1(id INT, val INT); INSERT INTO t1 VALUES (1,10),(2,20),(3,30);
CREATE TABLE t1(id INT, val INT);
CREATE TABLE t1(id INT, val INT); INSERT INTO t1 VALUES (1,100);
